attributes.action: Introduce a 24hr a day Covid-19 vaccination programme to speed up rollout
attributes.background: The UK Government is not rolling out the available vaccines fast enough. Efforts should be concentrated on this by funding a 24hr programme of vaccination, to speed up the rollout.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
